1 Kings or 3 Kings__11.13__One tribe: : Besides that of Juda, his own native tribe.
1 Kings or 3 Kings__11.41__The book of the words: : This book is lost, with divers others mentioned in holy writ.
1 Kings or 3 Kings__11.43__Solomon slept: : That is, died. He was then about fifty-eight years of age, having reigned forty years.
